description: Gaussian binomial coefficient [ n,5 ] for q=-13.
references: J. Goldman and G.-C. Rota, The number of subspaces of a vector space, pp. 75-83 of W. T. Tutte, editor, Recent Progress in Combinatorics. Academic Press, NY, 1969.
I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration. Wiley, NY, 1983, p, 99.
M. Sved, Gaussians and binomials, Ars. Combinatoria, 17A (1984), 325-351.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 5..180
Index entries related to Gaussian binomial coefficients.
prog: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,5,-13) for n in xrange(5,13)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 27 2009](PARI) A015321(n,r=5,q=-13)=prod(i=1,r,(q^(n-i+1)-1)/(q^i-1)) \\ - M. F. Hasler, Nov 03 2012
